        create a Window Pattern from JSON file
        Parameters:
        nickname - of the player to verify he chose a correct Window Pattern
        firstIndex - of the card in the file
        secondIndex - specify if it is the front or the back of the card
        Returns:
        the WindowPattern or null if there was same errors
